name: CatSitBot
description:
As a freelance robot cat-sitter, protect your client's space cats from literally exploding from hunger!

  • Move around with arrow keys, pick up or drop tins of food with Z.
  • Food will be delivered to a random point on the screen.
  • Hungry cats are orange or, if very hungry indeed, red. Normally they are white.
  • To feed a cat, pick up a tin and drop it on the cat. You cannot feed a cat that isn't hungry - if you try, you will just drop the tin instead.
  • If you are hit by a trespasser or caught in a cat explosion, you will be stunned for a second and drop any tin you are carrying. This time is cumulative.
